articles.title: 13-year-old shot at Oakland's Madison Park Academy; 12-year-old suspect in custody
articles.description: A student was shot at a middle school in East Oakland Monday and the 12-year-old suspect is in custody, sheriff's deputies said.
articles.content:
OAKLAND, Calif. - A 13-year-old boy was shot at a middle school in East Oakland Monday and the 12-year-old suspect is in custody, sheriff's deputies said.

articles.title: California Fast Food Wages Would Be Set by Government Under Bill Passed by State Legislature
articles.description: Representatives for chains including McDonald’s persuaded the state Senate, which passed the bill Monday, to remove a provision holding them liable for labor violations by franchisees.
articles.content: Californias Legislature passed a bill Monday to create a government panel that would set wages for an estimated half-million fast food workers in the state, a first-in-the-U.S. approach to workplace … [+446 chars]

articles.title: Victim fought gunman in Oregon grocery store shooting that left 2 dead, police say
articles.description: One of the victims fought to disarm the suspected gunman during Sunday's fatal shooting at a Safeway grocery store in Bend, Oregon, according to police spokeswoman Sheila Miller.
articles.content: One of the victims fought to disarm the suspected gunman during Sunday's fatal shooting at a Safeway grocery store in Bend, Oregon, according to police spokeswoman Sheila Miller.
